item.title: [JDK-8344993] [21u] [REDO] Backport JDK-8327501 and JDK-8328366 to JDK 21
item.description:
JDK-8327501 and JDK-8328366 got backported to OpenJDK 21.0.5 and backed out with JDK-8341989 in the same release 21.0.5. This is a redo bug for a new attempt to fix the class unloading issue described in JDK-8327501 in a future version of OpenJDK 21.

By backing out JDK-8341989, we plan to re-introduce JDK-8327501 and JDK-8328366 to JDK 21u. Contrary to the initial attempt to have JDK-8327501 and JDK-8328366 in JDK 21u, we will now also backport JDK-8342905 that fixes the issue observed with the previous attempt.
item.summary: [21u] [REDO] Backport JDK-8327501 and JDK-8328366 to JDK 21

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Author: Martin Balao <mbalao@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-12-03 15:25:26 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u/commit/96a3a88ee206680ba06c6ed876b538de41ff511c

Changeset: 96a3a88e
Branch: master
Author: Martin Balao <mbalao@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-12-03 15:25:26 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/commit/96a3a88ee206680ba06c6ed876b538de41ff511c

[jdk21u-fix-request] Approval Request from Martin Balao Alonso
JDK 21u is affected by bug 8327501. I'd like to redo the fix for 8327501 and its follow up fix 8328366. I'll then propose 8342905 to fix a bug introduced by 8328366.
Updated the description of the bug so as to make it clear for future readers what happened. This is essentially a redo-bug, but for JDK 21.

A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/1181
Date: 2024-11-25 22:17:04 +0000
